duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager in staffing, setup, merchandising, pack-up and teardown of a Seasonal Store.

Responsible for supporting the Store Manager in the overall operation of a store ensuring maximum sales/profitability by establishing and maintaining Guest Services, developing staff, controlling expenses, shrinkage and all aspects of merchandising and inventory control.
Minimum age requirement of 18 and must have a flexible schedule.
Physical demands of the job require 8+ hours of standing and walking, climbing ladders, setting up fixtures and lifting/moving up to 50 pounds.
Prior retail management experience is required.
